comment._content: Did Larry King play on this team?

comment.author: 9919978@N02
comment._content:
BROOKLYN BRIDEGROOMS is not as intimidating a name as, say, the TIGERS! lol

I wonder if it was a matter of sponsorship? That must be it. Not that I do not love it and as a New Yorker, would not have rooted for them!

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: No, the name came from the fact that a number of players had recently married.
